about_the_game:
Bring your friends along and explore the world of Dreamland!
Cube Faces is a co-op, adventure, platformer filled with unique challenges, mini-games, and puzzles for you to enjoy!

2 - 4 Player Online Co-Op


Bring 2 - 4 friends along on your journey through out Dreamland!
Cube Faces requires at least 2 players in order to play!

Explore and help the residents of Dreamland!


Explore the different worlds of Dreamland, each one following a different character in need of desperate help!
Follow along with their story and enjoy the unique gameplay twists of their world.

Customize your Cube Face!


Customize your Cube Face with unique skins and hats!
With each new world unlocked, new skins and hats are unlocked for you to try on!

name: Cube Faces

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T or AMD FX 6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Cube Faces is a co-op, adventure, platformer for 2 - 4 players. Filled with unique challenges, mini-games and puzzles! You and your friends must help the residents of Dreamland!
